overflow.description: Performs a buffer overflow attack on the library at the specified memory address (`string`) with the specified vulnerable value. Additional data may need to be provided (via the optional extra parameter) for the exploit to work (e.g. if the exploit changes a user's password).

example: if not meta then exit("Error: missing /lib/metaxploit.so")
if not lib then exit("Error: missing /lib/init.so")
version.description: Returns the version number (`string`) of the library.

lib_name.description: Returns the file name of the library (`string`).
